verbose_text: Ultimately, our work in PV may help elucidate the developmental pathway of IgG4 in other conditions, potentially leading to better therapeutic strategies that target these populations in IgG4 mediated disease or promote IgG4 B cell development in allergen tolerization protocols.
evidence: PV may help elucidate the developmental pathway of IgG4 in other conditions, potentially leading to better therapeutic strategies that target these populations in IgG4-mediated disease or promote IgG4
